item.title: Houthis in Yemen Won’t Be Defeated by Airstrikes Alone, Experts Say
item.description: U.S. officials seek to curb the militants’ attacks on ships in the Red Sea, but the group was not deterred by strikes in the Biden era and won’t be be...

item.title: Gaia to Shut Down After More Than a Decade of Mapping the Milky Way
item.description: After more than a decade of mapping the stars, the European spacecraft was shut down on Thursday. But its legacy lives on.

item.title: European Leaders Try to Hammer Out Ukraine Support Plans
item.description: Over 30 officials gathered in Paris for the meeting. But who is willing to do what in this coalition is still unclear.

item.title: Secrets on Signal
item.description: We explain how the group chat leak could have happened.

item.title: Rattled by Trump, America’s Allies Shift to Defense Mode on Tariffs
item.description: The new auto tariffs are straining relations with U.S. allies and deepening doubts about America’s reliability as a partner.
